oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A question of Nori, Segre classes of ideals and other applications

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: EULER CLASS GROUP
PROJECTIVE GENERATION
THEOREMS

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we prove the moving lemma, the addition and subtraction principles, in a more general setup than the available ones. We apply these results to explore a question of Nori on homotopy of sections of projective modules. As another application, we investigate the Segre class of ideals, extending the existing results.
